commands.name: install_dlc_workshoptools_cvar
commands.description: Install the Counter-Strike Workshop Tools

commands.name: cl_teamcounter_playercount_instead_of_avatars
commands.description: During the active portion of the round, replace player avatars with team player count in the mini-scoreboard.

commands.name: cl_weapon_selection_rarity_color
commands.description: Weapons glow with their rarity color in the HUD

commands.name: cl_teamid_overhead_colors_show
commands.ingameName: Use Player Colors on Team ID
commands.description: Use player colors on the name above teammates' heads

commands.name: cl_mute_enemy_team
commands.description: Mutes the enemy team (COMPROBAR EN QUE)

commands.name: cl_mute_all_but_friends_and_party
commands.description: Mutes all players except friends and party members

commands.name: cl_allow_animated_avatars
commands.description: Allow animated avatars in the HUD

commands.name: cl_sanitize_player_names
commands.description: Change name of players not in your friends list to something neutral

commands.name: cl_scoreboard_survivors_always_on
commands.description: Nobody knows what this does (maybe dangerzone stuff)

commands.name: cl_obs_interp_enable
commands.description: Smooth the camera transition between players in spectator mode

commands.name: cl_sniper_delay_unscope
commands.ingameName: Delay Sniper Rifle Un-Scope after Shot
commands.description: Adds a delay after firing a shot before you can un-scope (only animation-wise and it's kinda awful)

commands.name: cl_sniper_auto_rezoom
commands.ingameName: Auto Re-Zoom Sniper Rifle After Shot
commands.description: Automatically re-zoom the sniper rifle after firing a shot

commands.name: cl_showloadout
commands.description: Determines whether the Primary, Secondary and Knife are always shown in the HUD, if they are hidden, they will show for a short time if you switch weapon

commands.name: cl_use_opens_buy_menu
commands.ingameName: Open Buy Menu with Use Key
commands.description: Open the buy menu with the use key

commands.name: cl_quickinventory_lastinv
commands.ingameName: Last Weapon on Radial Weapon Trap
commands.description: This option is locked to true ingame, it currently doesn't work, and nobody uses the radial weapon menu

commands.name: cl_radar_always_centered
commands.description: Centers the radar on the player

commands.name: cl_radar_rotate
commands.description: Rotates the radar to match the player's view direction

commands.name: cl_hud_radar_map_additive
commands.ingameName: Radar HUD Map Blends With Background
commands.description: Blends the radar layout with the background

commands.name: cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard
commands.description: Changes the shape of the radar to a square when the scoreboard is open

commands.name: cl_radar_scale_dynamic
commands.description: Changes the zoom level of the radar based on the map information

commands.name: cl_grenadecrosshair_keepusercrosshair
commands.description: Keep the regular crosshair when holding grenades

commands.name: cl_grenadecrosshair_flash
commands.description: Show the grenade line-up crosshair for flashbangs

commands.name: cl_grenadecrosshair_explosive
commands.description: Show the grenade line-up crosshair for HE grenades

commands.name: cl_grenadecrosshair_fire
commands.description: Show the grenade line-up crosshair for Molotov cocktails and incendiary grenades

commands.name: cl_grenadecrosshair_smoke
commands.description: Show the grenade line-up crosshair for smoke grenades

commands.name: cl_grenadecrosshair_decoy
commands.description: Show the grenade line-up crosshair for decoy grenades

commands.name: cl_predict_body_shot_fx
commands.description: Predict the body shot effects (blood and sound effects)

commands.name: cl_predict_head_shot_fx
commands.description: Predict the head shot effects (blood, sparks and sound effects)

commands.name: cl_predict_kill_ragdolls
commands.description: Transforms the player model into a ragdoll if a kill is predicted, could get reverted if the prediction was wrong

commands.name: snd_steamaudio_enable_perspective_correction
commands.description: *Yes:* Sound sources will be rendered accurately with respect to your field of view as you look at the PC screen. Sound emitters that are on the edge of your field of view will sound slightly in front of you. Sound emitters that are off-screen and directly to your side will sound fully panned to either L or R respectively. \n *No:* Sound emitters at the edge of your field of view will sound strongly panned to either L or R respectively. Ideal for those who play very close to the screen, or use wearable screen, or players that prefer legacy sound engines. Can be positionally misleading at certain angles to the listener.

commands.name: snd_mute_losefocus
commands.ingameName: Play Audio When Game In Background
commands.description: Determines whether the game will play audio when you tabbed out

commands.name: voice_loopback
commands.description: Determines whether the game will play your own voice in the speakers

commands.name: voice_always_sample_mic
commands.description: Setups the mic when you open the game instead of the first time you press Push To Talk

commands.name: snd_mute_mvp_music_live_players
commands.ingameName: Mute MVP Music when players on both teams are alive
commands.description: Determines whether to mute the MVP music when some players on both teams are alive

commands.name: m_pitch
commands.description: Sets the mouse pitch (vertical axis) to -0.022 in the game

commands.name: m_yaw
commands.description: Sets the mouse yaw (horizontal axis) to -0.022 in the game

commands.name: cl_show_equipped_character_for_player_avatars false
commands.ingameName: Show Equipped Character for Player Avatars
commands.description: Determines whether to show the equipped character for player avatars in the HUD instead of Steam profile pricture

commands.name: cl_invites_only_mainmenu
commands.ingameName: Get invites only in Main Menu
commands.description: If turned on, will ignore all invites when user is playing a match

commands.name: rate
commands.description:
Allows to specify game traffic bandwidth that online game servers send to you during gameplay. Lower bandwidth rate setting can help avoid packet loss if your internet service provider or routers drop network packets. Insufficient bandwidth rate however can result in delayed network packets at times when game server sends updates about multiple other players over the network to your client. The values are: 98304
131072
196608
262144
327680
393216
524288
786432
commands.enumNames: Extremely restricted/Below 1.0 Mbps/Up to 1.5 Mbps/Up to 2 Mbps/Up to 2.5 Mbps/3 Mbps/4 Mbps/Unrestricted

commands.name: cl_net_buffer_ticks
commands.ingameName: Buffering to smooth over packet loss / Jitter
commands.description: Buffer snapshots from the server and commands from the client. This reduces the rate of missed ticks but increases your effective ping time

commands.name: cl_hud_color
commands.description: Change the color of the HUD elements

commands.name: cl_teamid_overhead_mode
commands.description: Select the info that shows above the head of your teammates
commands.enumNames: Off/Pips/Pips, Names, and Health/Pips, Names, Health, and Equipment

commands.name: cl_teammate_colors_show
commands.description: Shows the color of your teammates in the mini-scoreboard, and radar

commands.name: lobby_default_privacy_bits2
commands.description: Default permissions for friends joining your lobby
commands.enumNames: Friends Need Invites/All Friends Can Join

commands.name: ui_setting_advertiseforhire_auto
commands.ingameName: Looking to Play when Counter-Strike Starts
commands.description: Set the looking to play status when Counter-Strike starts

commands.name: cl_player_ping_mute
commands.description: Determine whether to show pings from teammates
commands.enumNames: Display and Play Sound/Display Without Sound/Disabled

commands.name: cl_hide_avatar_images
commands.ingameName: Hide Avatar Images and Customized Items
commands.description: Hide avatar images and replace them with the default ones

commands.name: spec_usenumberkeys_nobinds
commands.description: Select the method for number key selection in spectator/map vote

commands.name: eom_local_player_defeat_anim_enabled
commands.ingameName: End of Match Local Player Defeat Animation
commands.description: Enable the local player defeat animation at the end of the match

commands.name: cl_silencer_mode
commands.ingameName: Detach Silencer on M4A1-S and USP-S
commands.description: Select the mode for detaching the silencer on M4A1-S and USP-S

commands.name: viewmodel_presetpos
commands.description: Select the viewmodel position preset

commands.name: cl_prefer_lefthanded
commands.description: Select the preferred viewmodel handedness

commands.name: r_drawtracers_firstperson
commands.description: Enable or disable first person tracers

commands.name: cl_buywheel_nonumberpurchasing
commands.description: Choose whether to use number keys for purchasing in the buy menu
commands.enumNames: Number Keys Buy Items/Ignored, Handled by Game

commands.name: cl_buywheel_donate_key
commands.description: Select the key for donating a weapon in the buy menu

commands.name: cl_hud_telemetry_frametime_show
commands.description: Show a graph of frame time and FPS in the HUD

commands.name: cl_hud_telemetry_ping_show
commands.description: Show a graph of ping in the HUD

commands.name: cl_hud_telemetry_net_misdelivery_show

commands.description: Show a graph of network problems in the HUD

commands.description: Show a graph of network jitter and misdelivery in the HUD

commands.name: cl_hud_telemetry_net_detailed
commands.ingameName: Use the detailed network quality display
commands.description: Show detailed network quality information in the HUD

commands.name: snd_headphone_eq_active
commands.description: Selects the equalizer profile for headphones

commands.name: voice_vox
commands.description: Select the voice/microphone mode

commands.name: option_duck_method
commands.description: Select the method for ducking (crouching)

commands.name: option_speed_method
commands.description: Select the method for walking (pressing Shift)

commands.name: cl_color
commands.description: Select the team preferred color

commands.name: cl_join_advertise
commands.description: Advertise joinable game in progress to Steam friends, otherwise need a Steam invite

commands.name: hud_scaling
commands.description: Scale the size of the HUD elements

commands.name: cl_obs_interp_pos_rate
commands.description: Adjust the speed of the camera transition between players

commands.name: cl_hud_radar_background_alpha
commands.description: Set the opacity of the radar background

commands.name: cl_hud_radar_scale
commands.description: Set the size of the radar in the HUD

commands.name: cl_radar_scale
commands.description: Set the zoom level of the radar

commands.name: cl_radar_scale_alternate
commands.description: Set the alternate zoom level of the radar

commands.name: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_flash
commands.description: Set the delay for the flashbang line-up crosshair

commands.name: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_explosive
commands.description: Set the delay for the HE grenade line-up crosshair

commands.name: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_fire
commands.description: Set the delay for the Molotov/incendiary grenade line-up crosshair

commands.name: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_smoke
commands.description: Set the delay for the smoke grenade line-up crosshair

commands.name: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_decoy
commands.description: Set the delay for the decoy grenade line-up crosshair

commands.name: cl_hud_telemetry_frametime_poor
commands.description: Set the threshold for poor frame time conditions, write the minimum FPS value here

commands.name: cl_hud_telemetry_net_misdelivery_poor
commands.ingameName: Network tick miss rate warning threshold
commands.description: Set the threshold for poor network conditions, write the maximum tick miss rate here

commands.name: sensitivity
commands.description: Set the mouse sensitivity for aiming

commands.name: zoom_sensitivity_ratio
commands.description: Set the sensitivity multiplier for zoomed aiming

commands.name: mm_dedicated_search_maxping
commands.description: Allows you to specify max acceptable matchmaking ping when searching for a game on official matchmaking servers. If there are official servers satisfying your ping setting then official matchmaking will always put you in a match hosted on those servers. If there are no official servers near you satisfying your ping setting then official matchmaking will put you in a match hosted on the next nearest official server, latency to which may exceed your ping setting.

commands.name: ui_steam_overlay_notification_position_horz
commands.description: Sets the horizontal offset of the Steam Community notification in the HUD

commands.name: ui_steam_overlay_notification_position_vert
commands.description: Sets the vertical offset of the Steam Community notification in the HUD

commands.name: volume
commands.description: Sets the master volume of the game

commands.name: snd_menumap_volume
commands.description: Sets the volume of the main menu ambiance

commands.name: snd_spatialize_lerp
commands.description: *0% - Physically Accurate:* Physically modeled sound panning behavior most accurately reflecting the emitter position. \n *100% - Isolated L/R:* Sound emitters that are directly to the side of the player will be hard panned with minimal blending into the opposite L/R channel. This provides a strong sense of left vs right but can be positionally misleading at certain angles to the listener. For players who prefer legacy sound panning behavior.

commands.name: snd_voipvolume
commands.description: Sets the volume of other players' voice chat

commands.name: voice_threshold
commands.description: Sets the microphone trigger threshold for voice chat

commands.name: snd_menumusic_volume
commands.description: Sets the volume of the main menu music

commands.name: snd_roundstart_volume
commands.description: Sets the volume of the round start sound

commands.name: snd_roundaction_volume
commands.description: Sets the volume of the round action sound

commands.name: snd_roundend_volume
commands.description: Sets the volume of the round end sound

commands.name: snd_mvp_volume
commands.description: Sets the volume of the MVP song

commands.name: snd_mapobjective_volume
commands.description: Sets the volume of the map objective sound

commands.name: snd_tensecondwarning_volume
commands.description: Sets the volume of the 10 second warning sound

commands.name: snd_deathcamera_volume
commands.description: Sets the volume of the death camera sound

commands.name: ui_steam_overlay_notification_position
commands.description: Sets the position of the Steam Community notification in the HUD

commands.name: cl_scoreboard_mouse_enable_binding
commands.ingameName: Scoreboard Mouse Enable / End of Match Scoreboard Toggle
commands.description: Enables mouse interaction with the scoreboard
commands.optionsNames: Secondary Fire/Duck/Jump/Drop Weapon/Last Weapon Used/Radio Message/Use
